name: 蒼葉
message: "Hello, thank you for calling Hum-Drum Junk. How may I be of service?"
Arabic: "السلام عليكم شكرا لاتصالك بي هام درنك جنك, كيف يمكينوني ان او ساعيدك؟"

name: 電話の人
message: "Uh, umm... I have a quick question."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Go right ahead."

name: 電話の人
message: "Do you carry custom parts for S-II type Allmates?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yes we do. We happen to have some in stock right now."

name: 電話の人
message: "Oh, really? I see. Thank you very much."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Would you like to place an order?"

name: 電話の人
message: "Oh, no. Um, well..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Sir?"

name: 電話の人
message: "Well, I know how this is going to sound, but..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yes?"

name: 電話の人
message: "I was wondering if maybe... we could meet up after work today?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Excuse me?"

name: 電話の人
message: "Oh, no, um, how should I put it... It's that voice. You have a very... nice voice, is all..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Oh, thank you. I'm very flattered. By the way, sir, I just thought of something that might interest you."

name: 電話の人
message: "Oh, sure..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You mentioned S-II type custom parts. It turns out we're expecting a shipment of brand-new parts for that series soon."

name: 電話の人
message: "Uh-huh..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "And we just so happen to be accepting preorders, but only for our most loyal customers. Would you be interested?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "It looks like they're going to be popular. I wouldn't be surprised if they sell out right away. If you preorder, you won't have to worry about missing out."

name: 電話の人
message: "Oh, but, um..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Of course, because this opportunity is only for our most special customers, if you do place a preorder... I could do a little something extra for you."

name: 電話の人
message: "E-Extra?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yes... extra."

name: 電話の人
message: "O-Oh, then by all means! I'll preorder!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Fantastic! If you could just send your personal data over..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Thank you very much! Your preorder has been placed."

name: 蒼葉
message: "We hope you'll continue shopping with us in the future!"

name: 電話の人
message: "Of course!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Thanks!"
I hang up the phone and let out a huge sigh.
Even when I know what they're up to, dealing with customers who want something other than spare parts is always a pain.
Your voice is so wonderful, I just have to meet you.
I get that sort of thing over the phone surprisingly often.

Just hearing my voice makes them want to meet me...<K>
What kind of guy says that to another guy?
In the beginning, I just shrugged it off, but it really started to bother me after a while.
Then one day, out of frustration, I tried using it to push product, and it worked!

Ever since, I've used it to improve my sales. That phone call just now was a good example.
Strangely enough, it doesn't happen in person.
Some customers have actually come looking for me after a call, but I always pretend like I don't know what they're talking about.
They all leave without realizing that I'm the person they spoke to over the phone.
Nothing bad has actually happened, so I figure no harm, no foul.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Phew... Okay. The manager should be back soon."
